Installation

Minimum Requirements

  1. Make sure, that system fulfills minimum requirements1):
Component Value
CPU 2 cores (1GHz)
RAM 4 GB
Storage 64 GB
Firmware UEFI

Installation

  1. Windows Setup:
    1. Language to install: English (United States).
    2. Time and currency format: English (United States).
    3. Keyboard or input method: US.
  2. Fix incompatibility issues:
    1. Press Shift + F10 to open CMD.
    2. Access Registry Editor:

      > regedit

    3. Set up registries:
    4. Close Registry Editor and CMD and click on Install now.
  3. Click on: I don't have a product key â‡’ Windows 11 Pro for Workstations2).
  4. Continue with the installation wizard.
1)
Windows 11 minimum requirements: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/windows-11-specifications.
2)
Windows 11 versions: https://liliputing.com/differences-between-windows-11-home-pro-enterprise-and-education.
